sentences.en: As the forerunner, "United 93" will take most of the heat, whether it deserves it or not.
sentences.cn: 作为先驱，无论是否值得，“93号曼联”都将承受大部分的压力。

sentences.en: This table was the forerunner of the modern table.
sentences.cn: 这张桌子是现代桌子的前身。

sentences.en: The Garmin Forerunner 410 looks like a regular watch.
sentences.cn: 佳明先驱410看上去就像一个普通的手表。
